name: John Lick
description:
A peppermint candy by the name of John Lick was happily living his life with his girlfriend, Britney Spearmint.

One day, the malicious Granny Gumdrop who lives on the high hill of Sweetzerland stole Britney away.

As John Lick begins his journey for vengeance, Granny Gumdrop releases her Sour Patch Kids to keep him at bay. Will he be able to free Britney?

CREDITS:

Artist: Marshall
